page.title: 13Farming (3)
page.content:
{Norval Farm}has an acreage of three hundred and fifty acres,with eighty heifers and a pedigree bull who has won many prizes at the Royal and Three Counties Show grounds. The cattle are auctioned at Banbury Market and sometimes exported to countries such as Iran, Spain and Italy. During the Second World War the farm was requisitioned by the Army and used as a Prisoner of War Camp.
{Honeybrook Farm}is a battery chicken farm. The eggs from the battery hens are graded and sold locally. The total acreage of the farm is seven acres.
